localised_description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
The Pegasi were brought to Nehekhara from the Dread King's homelands. Now the reanimated bones still serve their Unliving masters.
